oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Computerization at the Life and Casualty Insurance Company, Nashville, Tennessee, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photographs related to the office computerization implemented at the Life and Casualty Insurance Company, Nashville, Tennessee, prior to the 1980s. Includes several pictures of staff personnel and company officials. Guilford Dudley, Jr. served as president of Life & Casualty Insurance Company from 1952 until 1969. In 1957, this prominent business enterprise moved into their new thirty-one-story skyscraper tower, located at 4th Avenue N and Church Street in downtown Nashville, Tennessee. Forms part of the Jerry Parker, Life and Casualty Insurance Company Collection. 37 b & w photographs, 1 color photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dudley, Guilford, 1907-2002
